individual_metadata.synopsis: This goblin guard is aggressive and self-important. She's been tasked with keeping drunkards out and is taking to her small responsibility like a little tyrant, but will immediately roll over if the player convinces her of their authority.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: - loadlevel WLD_Main_A - goto 297.37, 40.39, -74.91- Approach the goblins

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided input contains only one session with an empty name. Since there is a single session, there is no ordering dependency or mutual exclusiveness with any other session.

0.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
0.text: Forgive the reception, eh, mate? Had some intruders a while back. Can't be too careful.
0.context: NodeContext: Friendly, conciliatory - she's given you a hard time but only because she had to. Just doing her job.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Was there a druid among these intruders?

7.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
7.text: A druid? Can't be sure - got one of 'em chained up below, though. Just follow the hollerin'.
7.context: NodeContext: Muted, thoughtful - she can't answer your question but wants to help.

16.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
16.text: Still a bit strange, your kind running around. Absolute says we're all one side now though, eh?

31.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
31.text: Already told you to bugger off, didn't I?

118.speaker: Player
118.text: You have - and I'm telling you to mind your manners.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: You have - and I'm telling you to mind your manners.

32.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
32.text: Oi! What's the bloody ruckus out there?
32.context: NodeContext: Annoyed and on-guard - she's heard a great deal of noise outside and you, a stranger, have just stumbled in

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

90.speaker: Narrator
90.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

35.speaker: Narrator
35.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

117.speaker: Narrator
117.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

53.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
53.text: Oh! B-beg pardon, True Soul! At y'service, of course.
53.context: NodeContext: Alarmed - she's just spoken sharply to someone who can kill her without a second thought.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: Why are you calling me a 'True Soul'?

135.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
135.text: Well... cos that's what you are, innit? One of them as hears our thoughts - and the voice of the Absolute.
135.context: NodeContext: Confused, but nervously trying to be respectful. You've asked her a question you should already know the answer to, but she can't call you on it. Her voice drips with awe when she describes your powers.

28.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
28.text: Like Priestess Gut and Boss Ragzlin. Gods, we even got one like you now.

29.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
29.text: Like Priestess Gut and Boss Ragzlin. Gods, we even got a drow now.
29.context: NodeContext: Voice awed as she talks about the great leaders blessed by this new god. (Pronounced DRAWER RAGS-LIN)

39.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
39.text: We follow the Absolute and them She speaks through.

98.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
98.text: At first we thought it were just Priestess Gut and Boss Ragzlin. Then the drow came along.
98.context: NodeContext: Explaining how things have changed.

110.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
110.text: Between the two of you, we're swimmin' in drow. Go ahead, I'm sure she's expectin' you.
110.context: NodeContext: Toeing the line of disrespectul.

43.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
43.text: And... you and all now, I reckon. Go ahead, please - I'm sure you're expected.
43.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, respectful - reminding herself that you're an important part of this new order.

49.speaker: Narrator
49.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

48.speaker: Narrator
48.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

113.speaker: Narrator
113.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

95.speaker: Player
95.text: It is loud. I think I lost my way in the confusion.

8.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
8.text: Aye, back the way you came now, afore I change my mind.
8.context: NodeContext: Confident, sneering - acting tough, like she's letting you off the hook.

103.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
103.text: That you have. Now - asked you a question, lovely. What's your business 'ere?
103.context: NodeContext: Sweet, with a clear note of threat underneath - you're wasting her time.

122.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
122.text: Outside, you bloody pisspot. Tell the rest of 'em to keep it down and all - work goin' on in 'ere.
122.context: NodeContext: You've convinced her you're drunk and she's disgusted, worried you're going to soil the floor. She's trying to get you outside ASAP.

111.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
111.text: You think I can't tell true drunk from false? Mate, I been guzzlin' grog since the teat.
111.context: NodeContext: Snorting, derisive - you're not fooling her.

66.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
66.text: Won't ask again - what's your business?
66.context: NodeContext: All humour dropped - she's one step away from violence

127.speaker: Player
127.text: That was the sound of your friends dying. Care to join them?

56.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
56.context: NodeContext: Incredulous that you'd talk to her this way, furious

58.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
58.text: Oi! Ain't no party in 'ere - we're doing the Absolute's work.
58.context: NodeContext: Annoyed, affronted - she's lost her patience with people stumbling in from the party.

72.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
72.context: NodeContext: Cold, deadly - the player has just passed through a party area, and this should be their first indication that the throne room is much more serious.

134.speaker: Narrator
134.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

100.speaker: Narrator
100.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

93.speaker: Narrator
93.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

115.speaker: Player
115.text: I'm here to see the True Souls. Do you want to keep them waiting?

81.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
81.text: ...Well, I didn't say that. But you'll need to be more specific, mate. Absolute's blessed us with three.
81.context: NodeContext: Realises she's treading on thin ice all of a sudden. Tone is more reasonable than other branches.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I'm not here to talk to a lowly guard.

79.speaker: Narrator
79.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

73.speaker: Narrator
73.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

68.speaker: Narrator
68.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

76.speaker: Narrator
76.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

12.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
12.text: Ah, beg p-pardon! You must be 'ere to join the other True Souls. Please, go right ahead.
12.context: NodeContext: Frightened and instantly cowed - you've just proved yourself to be a very high-ranking member of their new religion and she's terrified that she's overstepped herself.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Why are you calling me a 'True Soul'?

107.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
107.text: Well... cuz that's what you are, innit? One of them as hears our thoughts - and the voice of the Absolute.
107.context: NodeContext: Confused, but nervously trying to be respectful. You've asked her a question you should already know the answer to, but she can't call you on it.

27.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
27.text: Like Priestess Gut and Boss Ragzlin. Gods, we even got a drow now.
27.context: NodeContext: Said in awe of their new leaders, particularly the strange fact that they have a drow on their side.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: 'Other' True Souls? What do you mean?

1.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
1.text: Well, beg pardon but... it ain't just you the Absolute speaks through.
1.context: NodeContext: Confused, hesitant - informing you that you are indeed special, but you're not the only one. Something you should already know.

21.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
21.text: At first we thought it were just Boss Ragzlin and Priestess Gut. Just our kind, like.
21.context: NodeContext: Explaining politely - something you should already know, but she's not about to question you.

6.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
6.text: Then the drow arrived. And now you - the Absolute 'as big plans for all of us, seems like.
6.context: NodeContext: Wonder - this was a big turn of events.

83.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
83.text: The Absolute is gatherin' us all together. For something big, I reckon.
83.context: NodeContext: Anticipation, confidence that their god has big plans for them

64.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
64.text: Then the drow arrived. And now you - the Absolute 'as big plans for all of us, seems like.
64.context: NodeContext: Wonder - this was a big turn of events.

59.speaker: Narrator
59.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

47.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
47.text: Oh no? Don't worry, mate - time for talk is well past. Get 'em!
47.context: NodeContext: Mocking, utterly unintimidated by you and about to attack.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I've got an audience with the one in charge.

10.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
10.text: Right. Well. You ain't the first foreign type, I s'pose.
10.context: NodeContext: Not expecting this, but keeping up a gruff exterior of command.

42.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
42.text: Gonna 'ave to be a bit more specific though, mate - Absolute's got a few favourites around here.
42.context: NodeContext: Prickly, pedantic - you've just strolled in without any knowledge of their internal situation. She's always happy to pretend she knows more than you.

77.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
77.text: Likes of you? Please. Only boss you need concern yourself with is me. Out. Now.
77.context: NodeContext: Smug, arrogant - you're not important enough to get inside and she's turning you away with a warning.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: You don't need to know about my business. Move.

13.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
13.text: All right, all right - normally, we'd stick you foreign types in the spider pit.
13.context: NodeContext: Intimidated but trying to pretend you're just being prickly. Conciliatory, like you're making a big deal where you shouldnt'.

91.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
91.text: But the Absolute says we're all makin' nice now. So in you go, I s'pose.
91.context: NodeContext: A resigned sigh - it's against everything she knows to treat an outsider with respect, but it's what her new god demands.

38.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
38.text: Well now, gonna 'ave to be more specific than that. We're drownin' in True Souls 'ere, we are.
38.context: NodeContext: Chuckling at your naivete - you may have convinced your way inside, but you clearly know nothing.

34.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
34.text: Your kind usually don't deal with Boss Ragzlin and Priestess Gut.

46.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
46.text: Guessin' you're after Minthara. Could be 'er blood by the looks of you.

121.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
121.text: Well look, big-boots 'ere has an appointment with Dror Ragzlin hisself!
121.context: NodeContext: Mocking, making a big deal (Pronounced Drawer RAGS-lin)

120.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
120.text: Throne room's at the back. He's communin', mind, so step soft.
120.context: NodeContext: Dismissing you, warning you to be cautious.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I want to see Priestess Gut.

97.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
97.text: Do ya now? Might feel different once she puts a burnin' brand to ya.
97.context: NodeContext: Tone is 'oh, really?' as if humouring someone who has made a grand statement.

23.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
23.text: She's through the main doors. Just follow the smell of burnt goblin-arse, heh.
23.context: NodeContext: Getting bored, gesturing you on. Last line is a little chuckle to herself.

123.speaker: Player
123.text: I've got an audience with Minthara.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I've got an audience with the drow.

128.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
128.text: 'Audience' is right. She's an uppity one and no mistake, but she knows 'er business.
128.context: NodeContext: Snorting at the drow's pretension, but acknowledging her power.

25.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
25.text: She's in tellin' the warchiefs wot's wot. Next raid's gonna be a big'un, I hear.

62.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
62.text: You 'ere to see Priestess Gut, Boss Ragzlin, or the drow?

106.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
106.text: Good for you. Turn back now and I won't spread yer business all over that wall.
106.context: NodeContext: First line is cheery - follow up a much more threatening tone.

61.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
61.text: Can't be 'ere to see the True Souls. Those types don't even bother to wait.

51.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
51.text: Oi! Only the Absolute 'erself gets to do that!

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I've got an audience with the one in charge.

3.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
3.text: You one of those Moonrise types, then?

55.speaker: Player
55.text: They seem ready to attack - be the one to strike first.

102.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
102.text: Forgive my tone just now, True Soul. Had a few intruders a while back. Just bein' careful.
102.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, subservient - she's just given you a hard time only to realise you're her superior.

109.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
109.text: Oi! Get your lardy arse out of the doorway. Serious work goin' on in 'ere.
109.context: NodeContext: Impatient, angry - you're wasting her time.
